AUTHOR: Injabie3#1660
INSTALL_MSG: The spoilers module was installed. You can use it by doing `[p]spoiler <message>`
NAME: Spoilers
SHORT: Emulates the spoiler tag seen in forums.
DESCRIPTION: Emulates the spoiler tag seen in forums by saving the message, deleting it, and posting a reactable message that will DM users the message contents upon adding a reaction.
